item.title: Episode 3
item.dc:creator: David Breese - Our First Dance
item.description:
Episode 3 – 60’s Motown

 

In celebration of the 50th Anniversary of the Motown Record Label, we thought we’d take a look at some suggestions from the Motown catalogue from the 1960’s.

 

In this episode we features songs from the Motown greats… The Four Tops, Stevie Wonder, Diana Ross & The Supremes, Marvin Gaye & Tammi Terrell, the Temptations and one of my personal Motown Favourites Heaven Must Have Sent You by the Elgins.

 

We will return to the Motown label again later this year in celebration of the 50th anniversary. With tunes from Smokey, Lionel, The Commodores to name a just a few.

 

Our podcast is now available through iTunes so please feel free to leave a comment on our shows on the  iTunes  website.

 

You can find details about all of our unique personalised music gifts to celebrate your Wedding First Dance on our WEBSITE
item.itunes:author: David Breese - Our First Dance

item.title: The Our First Dance Podcast Episode 2
item.dc:creator: David Breese - Our First Dance
item.description:
Welcome to the second episode of the Our First Dance Podcast.

 

In this episode we feature songs from the movies that we feel would make suitable wedding first dance songs.

 

Including songs from films like When Harry Met Sally, Robin Hood, Desperately Seeking Susan, Buster and Mermaids to name a few.

please feel free to leave a comment on the show.
item.itunes:author: David Breese - Our First Dance
item.itunes:subtitle:
in the second episode we feature suitable songs for a wedding first dance with some selected tunes from the movies...
Including songs from - When Harry Met Sally, Mermaids, Buster and A James Bond film...
item.itunes:summary:
in the second episode we feature suitable songs for a wedding first dance with some selected tunes from the movies...
Including songs from - When Harry Met Sally, Mermaids, Buster and A James Bond film...
as well as our regular You Cannot Be Serious feature, we also offer you an obscure but suitable song for your wedding first dance,
hopefully providing inspiration for couple who are seeking a song for their first dance

item.title: The Our First Dance Podcast Episode 1
item.dc:creator: David Breese - Our First Dance
item.description:
In the first episode of the our first dance podcast we concentrate on the top ten of the survey that we have been running on the site for the best part of 3 years now...

The survey has in excess of 2,000 entries so it is quite a detailed survey with over one hundred different songs already listed.

In the episode we concetrate on the 10 most popular songs in the survey although we will visit many other the more obscure ones in future episodes.

Other features in the first podcast include..

The "YOU CANNOT BE SERIOUS" section which will include a song that has been listed on the survey but is hardly suitable for a wedding first dance.

Also our five top tips on creating a memorable wedding first dance...

And at the end of every show we will offer up an obscure but suitable tune to perform your wedding first dance to.
item.itunes:author: David Breese - Our First Dance
item.itunes:subtitle: The 'Our First Dance' podcast hopes to offer musical inspiration for couples searching for a suitable song to perform their wedding first dance to.
item.itunes:summary: The 'Our First Dance' podcast hopes to offer musical inspiration for couples searching for a suitable song to perform their wedding first dance to.
